Posts Tagged “lap dancer”

October 21, 2010JD Rennison

Unfairness

I read on a left-on-a-train-seat free paper that "a Â£200,000-a-year lap dancer sues blah blah blah..."

Nothing says "life isn't fair" more than when someone makes more money in a day just for taking off her clothes than many make in a month working real jobs.
